channel.title: Versace on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Versace on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amanda Seyfried Borrows Julia Roberts’ Versace Look for Venice Film Festival: “Sharing Is Caring”
item.description: The Emmy Award winning actress stepped out at the Venice Film Festival to promote her new film, ‘The Testament of Ann Lee,’ in a look worn last week by Julia Roberts.

item.title: Amanda Seyfried Borrows Julia Roberts’ Versace Look for Venice Film Festival: “Sharing Is Caring”
item.description: The Emmy Award winning actress stepped out at the Venice Film Festival to promote her new film, ‘The Testament of Ann Lee,’ in a look worn last week by Julia Roberts.

item.title: Julia Roberts Debuted Dario Vitale’s First Versace Pieces During Venice Film Festival Appearance
item.description: The Oscar winning actress stepped out at the Venice Film Festival to promote her new Luca Guadagnino film ‘After the Hunt’ in a look by Versace with a handbag that honors Roberts’ married name.

item.title: Julia Roberts Debuted Dario Vitale’s First Versace Pieces During Venice Film Festival Appearance
